description: Join the SMB server to an Active Directory domain.

domain_password.description: Password of the domain-user specified to join the Active Directory domain.

domain_user_name.description: Name of a domain-user with sufficient privileges to join the Active Directory domain.

id.description: Unique identifier of the SMB server.

organizational_unit.description: Organizational unit of the SMB server in Active Directory, if applicable.

reuse_computer_account.description: If set to yes: try to reuse the existing SMB server account in the Active Directory when joining.
